isis.stitle: HYDRO-MAX™ BRAKE BOOSTER AND MASTER CYLINDER - MAINTENANCE

step1.para: Master cylinder brake fluid level should be within one inch of the bottom of reservoir fill port ring openings. Refer to Warning Label located on the side of the master cylinder reservoir.
Check for external leaks, particularly at hydraulic line connections or at master cylinder mounting flange.

Check condition of brake fluid; it should be clean with no evidence of contamination, except for discoloration and floating silicone. This silicone material, used by Bosch to lubricate the master cylinder piston bore to facilitate component installation and testing, is compatible with brake fluid. Refer to Bosch Bulletin No. PRO-20-08, dated October 10, 1993.
Check that brake pedal stops vehicle without feeling spongy or hard.
